1 #!/usr/bin/env node
  2 /*jslint
  3     white: true,
  4     vars: true,
  5     node: true
  6 */
  7 
  8 /**
  9  * cli functions
 10  * @namespace cli functions
 11  */
 12 var cli = {
 13     /**
 14      * main function called when script is accessed through the command line.
 15      * @param {Object} opts Options object.
 16      * @param {String} [opts.infile=stdin] The name of the file to be read,
 17      *  also accepts from stdin.
 18      * @param {String} [opts.outfile=stdout] The name of the file to write
 19      *  results to
 20      */
 21     main : function main (opts) {
 22         "use strict";
 23         function fReadCb (outfile, err, source) {
 24             if (err) {
 25                 throw err;
 26             } 
 27             formatjs(outfile, source);
 28         }
 29         function formatjs (outfile, source, cb) {
 30             "use strict";
 31             cb = cb || function () {
 32                 return null;
 33             };
 34             function fWriteCb (cb, err, data) {
 35                 if (err) {
 36                     throw err;
 37                 }
 38                 cb(data);
 39             }
 40             var out = require('./atropa-jsformatter.js')(source);
 41             if(outfile) {
 42                 require('fs').writeFile(
 43                     require('path').resolve(outfile),
 44                     out,
 45                     {encoding: 'utf8'},
 46                     fWriteCb.bind(null, cb)
 47                 );
 48             } else {
 49                 console.log(out);
 50             }
 51         }
 52         var read = fReadCb.bind(null, opts.outfile);
 53         if(opts.infile) {
 54             require('fs').readFile(
 55                 require('path').resolve(opts.infile),
 56                 {encoding: 'utf8'},
 57                 read
 58             );
 59         } else {
 60             var format = formatjs.bind(null, opts.outfile);
 61             cli.readin(format);
 62         }
 63     },
 64     /**
 65      * Reads from stdin and calls the callback on the data received.
 66      * @param {Function} cb The callback function to execute on the received
 67      *  data.
 68      * @private
 69      */
 70     readin : function readin(cb) {
 71         "use strict";
 72         var stdin = process.openStdin(),
 73         data = '';
 74 
 75         stdin.setEncoding('utf8');
 76         stdin.addListener('data', function (chunk) {
 77             data += chunk;
 78         });
 79         stdin.addListener('end', function () {
 80             cb(data);
 81         });
 82     }
 83 };
 84 if (require.main === module) {
 85     var opts = {
 86         infile : process.argv[2],
 87         outfile : process.argv[3]
 88     };
 89     cli.main(opts);
 90 }
 91 
 92 module.exports = cli;
